metadata.name: Alpha Gods: Revelation
metadata.description: On the run from their former masters in the Department of Extra-Human Affairs, Revenant is forced to reveal his secret when a tragedy hits. Meanwhile, the shape shifting Nephilim have recruited the Merovingian Prince to fulfil an ancient prophecy and finally free their fathers, the Grigori, from their extra-dimensional prison. How will the Alpha Gods cope with pressures that threaten to tear the team apart?
